title: Smeaton's Gin
tagline: Responsive website of the alcohol distillery, which created a hand-made recipe discovered in Bristol archives from the 1970s under the name 'Bristol Method Dry Gin'
headline: Website for the Bristol Method Dry Gin
content1:
After successfully recreating the original Bristol Method Dry Gin found in the Bristol Archives, Smeaton’s decided to refresh the look and feel of their old website.

Smeaton’s wanted a mobile-friendly website that could tell the story about how they recreated the Bristol Method Dry Gin according to the original recipe.
content2:
Smeaton's wanted their website to match the branding of their new bottle packaging. The client provided artwork whereas my task was to make the website out of provided resources.

It has been a challenge to choose the right artwork from hundreds of illustrations. It was important to make sure each illustration featured on the website serves its purpose.
content3: The website uses a content management system that enables the client to manage the website. We hope that the new website will enable them to promote their product to its fullest potential.
